title: Raxco PerfectDisk Professional & Server x 32 & 64
description: Description: New, 9 version of the known rule of products PerfectDisk intended for defragmentatsii of hard disk! PerfectDisk from Raxco Software gives user the possibility to defragmentirovat\&#039; information on the winchesters, increasing thus the productivity of disk subsystem. In contrast to the similar programs (Norton Speed Disk and Disk Defragmenter from collection Windows and other), Perfect Disk can work under any Windows- platform with any file system even with the minimum of free disk space, it makes it possible to defragmentirovat\&#039; not only files, but also MFT (main table it is file in NTFS- division), the files metadannykh, base MS Exchange. It also optimizes directories, removing the remote records, it defragmentiruyet swap- file, it pererazmeshchayet files on the disk depending on the frequency of their use, unite vacant place... Original are also the functions of tuning through the profiles, network planning of defragmentatsii, renovation through the Internet, tuned recordings of work and support RAID of volumes.
